parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the [[:Category:Data Types|data type]] of an expression. 

The type is returned as on of the following all-uppercase strings:
* "[[Array|ARRAY]]"
* "[[Bool|BOOL]]"
* "[[Code|CODE]]"
* "[[Config|CONFIG]]"
* "[[Control|CONTROL]]"
* "[[Display|DISPLAY]]"
* "[[Group|GROUP]]"
* "[[Location|LOCATION]]"
* "[[Object|OBJECT]]"
* "[[Scalar|SCALAR]]"
* "[[Script|SCRIPT]]"
* "[[Side|SIDE]]"
* "[[String|STRING]]"
* "[[Text|TEXT]]"
* "[[Team Member|TEAM_MEMBER]]"
* "[[Namespace|NAMESPACE]]"
* "[[Diary Record|DIARY_RECORD]]"
* "[[Task|TASK]]"
They represent the available [[Data_Types|data types]] in Arma.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative</title><part><name index="1"/><value>For comparing types, use [[isEqualType]] command instead in <template><title>arma3</title></template></value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''typeName''' anything </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> anything: [[Anything]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_msg = "hello"; _result = [[typeName]] _msg;  //_result will be "STRING"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_unit = [[player]]; _result = [[typeName]] _unit; //_result becomes "OBJECT"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Values representing direct [[Data Types]]:<code>[[hint]] [[typeName]] 0; //SCALAR
[[hint]] [[typeName]] ""; //STRING
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[true]]; //BOOL
[[hint]] [[typeName]] []; //ARRAY
[[hint]] [[typeName]] {}; //CODE
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[objNull]]; //OBJECT
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[grpNull]]; //GROUP
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[controlNull]]; //CONTROL
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[teamMemberNull]]; //TEAM_MEMBER
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[displayNull]]; //DISPLAY
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[taskNull]]; //TASK
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[locationNull]]; //LOCATION
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[sideUnknown]]; //SIDE
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[text]] ""; //TEXT
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[configFile]]; //CONFIG
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[configNull]]; //CONFIG (Since Arma 3 v1.53.133130)
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[missionNamespace]]; //NAMESPACE
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[diaryRecordNull]]; //DIARY_RECORD (Since Arma 3 v1.99.146508)</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[typeName]] _this [[!=]] "ARRAY") [[exitWith]] {
	[[hint]] "_this is not an array!"
}
//is the same as 
[[if]] ([[typeName]] _this [[!=]] [[typeName]] []) [[exitWith]] {
	[[hint]] "_this is not an array!"
}
//same result but faster in <template><title>arma3</title></template>
[[if]] !(_this [[isEqualType]] []) [[exitWith]] {
	[[hint]] "_this is not an array!"
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[isEqualTypeAll]], [[isEqualType]], [[isEqualTypeParams]], [[isEqualTypeArray]], [[isEqualTypeAny]], [[typeOf]], [[isKindOf]], [[isClass]], [[isArray]], [[isNumber]], [[isText]], [[isNil]], [[isNull]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
